website_summaries.verdict: Under Armour makes it big with the HOVR Havoc. This generally well-received model is said to be a lot better than more expensive options on the market today. Its midsole is composed of time-tested EVA and HOVR, which is a technology borrowed from the company’s running line. Its upper is made of two-tone mesh, and it just feels great on foot. The fact that this shoe is relatively affordable makes it a really attractive offer that’d be too hard to resist.
pros: A handful of reviewers are happy that this pair of Under Armour shoes can really withstand a beating on the court
Fit is not an issue because the UA HOVR Havoc runs true to size
The rubber outsole is made thinner to reduce the shoe’s weight
A few users appreciate the resulting lightness
The EVA-HOVR cushioning setup effectively makes the shoe comfortable to wear
The Under Armour Curry 6 is also equipped with HOVR cushioning
Many users say that Under Armour is wise for using herringbone on the outsole
it makes the shoe grippy and stable
Several buyers are happy that this amazing shoe’s price is within the affordable range
The materials feel awesome, some wearers say
Many love how these UA shoes look
cons: Just like the Nike Zoom Kobe 1 Protro, this model takes time to fully break in

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe- tough break-in on ankles
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, only issue is the “break-in” period on the ankle support. Only hooped twice in them thus far, great shoe- but they are cutting up my ankles on the outsides.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the smaller size
customer_reviews.text: First use wasn't exactly a pleasure as the friction by the achilles tendon gave me a small burn, but on the second use that went away and I really felt the cushion and the protection, no burns or bruises. I usually wear 10 on my Nikes and Adidas and went for that size and I think they are a bit small, half a size up could've been perfect, but still they feel good.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Weak lacing system, need a refund
customer_reviews.text: How can I return the shoes, at first they seem good, but then they broke. The upper lacing system in the ankle area break apart so it is unplayable you get no support or ankle protection. I need a refund, a return or an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Manolo

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe, Will buy again. Traction is best in the business, they were light with great support. They are comfortable and fit tight to the feet. I just bought a half size smaller than my regular size and I was a half size to small go figure.
customer_reviews.author: justin bakk

customer_reviews.title: Fine shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size, but they were easy to return and they sent me the right size right away! I'm interested to see how long the lace straps hold up because they seem a little flimsy. But maybe they'll do great. I'm happy for now!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Rebsch

customer_reviews.title: Best for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This Basketball shoe is the best I've had in a while, i love the support it gives my ankles, the traction is great and its a comfortable Basketball shoe. I love these sneaks!
customer_reviews.author: lawrence armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great for volleyball too!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beloved by my 14YO volleyball player, who prefers the ankle stability of basketball shoes to women's volleyball shoes. True to size. A little hard on the ankle/low calf when breaking in, but she's already asked me for an additional pair (she is hard on her feet and blows through shoes quickly). Couldn't be more pleased! Great floor grip and super cushioned landings I'm told.
customer_reviews.author: Cappyaldu

customer_reviews.title: Basket Ball Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these when he practices basketball (not in games) and he loves them. They are not as heavy as the usual shoes but they still give him comfort. The hightop feature also is not too stiff and it also protects his ankles. He said he wished there was a bit more "padding" on the bottom but other than that, they are great for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Run bit small but very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shows run a little bit small, maybe like 1/2 size smaller. The design and Cushing is very nice, I like them so far. I bought them to play basketball so durability will be put to the test in the next couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: A bit of Ankle restriction, but solid.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great, a little uncomfortable around the ankle area but I needed good ankle support and this shoe delivered what I was expecting. The shoe gives the sensation that all of your weight sits right on the ball of the foot, I feel like I am walking with the ball of my feet rather than feeling the whole foot in contact. I think this is more a shoe for shooting guards, because the shoe doesn’t feel fast. But for me works great, I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Purple high tops!! YES!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fit, and price point! Bouns points for PURPLE! POWER!
customer_reviews.author: oliVer says:

customer_reviews.title: We have had great luck with this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Go 1/2 size up as they run on the snug size. And you have to lace them properly (using both the inside and outside loops) - the one review it is obvious from the pictures that they didn't lace the shoe up correctly). This is my son's GO TO shoes for basketball....we are on pair #4. Gives him the ankle support to rebound, traction to go fast and stop quickly, and the HOVR bottom is awesome explosiveness and height. We added some VK insoles -- and all I can say is wow. This is the perfect shoe for a 4, 5 player. We have gotten a really hard season out of each pair.
customer_reviews.author: BB Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best $70 bucks I’ve ever spent!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very comfy, stylish, has good ankle support, nice neutral color Cons: Absolutely nothing... there are no cons at all. For this price, you WILL NOT find a pair of shoes of this quality. You won’t regret buying these! 🤘🏼
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband to play basketball once a week with his friends. I found out they broke the 3rd time he wore them but never told me so now it’s to late to return. The hole the lace goes through actually broke so it won’t hold the lace. They look brand new and he can’t wear them. Very disappointed. I have purchased a lot of under armour in the past and never had an issue before.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: The ankle area does not leave much room to flex when playing basketball
customer_reviews.text: Super tight on the ankle makes it hard to flex when playing basketball! Comfortable feels nice would have to like the ankle area to feel constricted or tight!
customer_reviews.author: beetle23

customer_reviews.title: Pressure on ankle and achilles
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of the shoes when walking around, but when actually playing in them the design puts a lot of pressure on the ankle and achilles. Had quite a bit of discomfort cutting and changing direction and the next day both ankles and achilles tendons were way more sore than they have ever been after playing. If you just stand in the corner and shoot 3's buy these because they look great, but any lateral movement is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is true to size. Great product. We’ll order again
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Manning

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe exceeded my expectations, size was perfect , price was great ! My son was very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: At first, was skeptical about the color. "I order red" But when they arrived and seeing them in person is totally different. I was relived! Fits perfectly and the quality is outstanding. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jihaad Faiz Mujalled

customer_reviews.title: UA Seems to Run Small
customer_reviews.text: I had to return, as I am a true Size 11, and these were very tight, almost feeling like a 10. I'd be generous saying they felt like a 10.5. Great shoe, great looking shoe. But buy a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Glinski

customer_reviews.title: Great durability and decently priced.
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and durability of the shoe. My son has been wearing these every day. The cushioning is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: A nice looking comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable pair of shoes that offer a lot of support. I need to buy a pair of purple shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bear

customer_reviews.title: Idaho mom
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking shoe. Fits true to size. My 14 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased in Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Rollerblades with no wheels!
customer_reviews.text: These are very tight and stiff and bulky. They look and feel like rollerblades. Would not reccomend. Returned them right away!
customer_reviews.author: Terrible

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes for the ankle support and they do that very well. They do run on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Took a few times of wearing to feel good but overall a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Rodolph

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It fits me well but The heel is a little uncomfortable after putting on the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mapengfei

customer_reviews.title: Poor ankle lace design
customer_reviews.text: After about 10 uses the leather strip at the top of the shoe ripped. Poorly design. It should have been attached to the shoe itself. Can’t pull the shoe tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: RAULAD

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, poorly designed tongue but good ankle support
customer_reviews.text: In my experience UA shoes run smaller with a tighter toe box than Adidas shoes. Closer to a Nike fit. The tongue on these constantly slips down. The only good things are the interesting look and good ankle support but it’ll be a long time before I try another US style for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: David Y. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It fits well BUT only if you wear an insole. It was a little hard around the ankles for some days (as you would expect from new shoes) but now it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet!
customer_reviews.text: A little tight in the toe area, go a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and grip
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, fits great and has great grip. No more slipping and sliding on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Rajasingh

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!! Very confortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sneakers!!! very comfortable!! Good for me fot ankle support in basketball!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean - Gaby Montuma

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: There ok feels good but the clutch fit drive 1 has spoiled me.
customer_reviews.author: Virus

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Basketball Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grip and fit comfortably. Not very wide if you’re looking for something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Fire ass shoes
customer_reviews.text: My kankles are secure from now on, wish they adapted the material of these shoes to a fitted groin cup.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for more outdoor use than indoor
customer_reviews.text: Great for outdoors. It is a hard sole, but when it came to an indoor court, especially wood, it isn’t that grippy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I lik it becz it fits perfect, so I bought two of them one for my father an one for me, we use them to wrkut.
customer_reviews.author: Khemraj

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: Stylish sneaker — runs small. Order a size larger for better comfort. Right around the ankle but a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Hasham

customer_reviews.title: Tore within a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Shoe tore after the second time I played with them. Very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Oren Yomorta

customer_reviews.title: Ripped laces
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes until the piece where the laces come through ripped, making them impossible to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Reed

customer_reviews.title: Expected more from Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: I wore these about 9-10 times and white strap near above the ankle area tore already.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Andrade

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: fits exactly, looks great, feels comfortable. can't say anything about durability, just received
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: runs small and the shoe looks as wide as it is long.
customer_reviews.author: ChelseaE

customer_reviews.title: Busted shoe at day 45
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality shoe, The shoe broke on me at day 45 meaning I couldn’t return them. Very large and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoes. Good quality, and they make me jump better. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit, and most of all a dope looking basketball shoe with very nice ankle support and a good sole
customer_reviews.author: Einar A.

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HOVR Havoc Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: The HOVR Havoc, our first model of basketball shoes made of Under Armour HOVR foam, absorb the impact of any jump, landing and change of direction on the field. They are also equipped with a lightweight mesh upper for better breathability and a support that adapts to the shape of the foot every time you wear them. Breathable two-tone mesh upper with TPU foil on the tip of the foot for added protection Resistant overlapping panels in synthetic material to ensure maximum stability to the central part of the foot Special lacing systems integrated in the forefoot, in the central part of the foot and on the heel to ensure a customized fit in strategic areas External TPU counter for a more stable support The melded EVA midsole ensures cushioning and support at the sole of the foot Under Armour HOVR technology provides a "gravity-free" feeling that favours the return of energy, reducing the impact on the ground with every step The Energy Web compression network contains and models the Under Armour HOVR foam that returns all the energy of your steps The TPU rod in the middle wraps the foot for greater lateral stability The rubber sole is made with a herringbone pattern that guarantees maximum traction, grip and grip on the ground. The anatomical grooves on the forefoot ensure a more natural flexibility Weight: 434 g
feature_bullets: Breathable two-tone mesh upper with TPU foil on the tip of the foot for added protection
Resistant overlapping panels in synthetic material to ensure maximum stability to the central part of the foot
Special lacing systems integrated in the forefoot, in the central part of the foot and on the heel
External TPU counter for a more stable support
The melded EVA midsole ensures cushioning and support at the sole of the foot
